text: Saumarez may refer to: * Saumarez, New Brunswick * James Saumarez, 1st Baron de Saumarez (1757–1836), admiral of the Royal Navy * James Saumarez, 4th Baron de Saumarez (1843–1937), diplomat * , ship of the Royal Navy. * , Royal Navy 'S'-class destroyer, saw service in Second World War * Saumarez (horse), thoroughbred racehorse * Saumarez Homestead, a homestead in Australia
